item.title: Grab Your Homework With Python and Telegram Bot
item.description: So I’m taking a programming paradigms course this semester and the homework will be published every Friday on a webpage. It’s kinda boring to check this webpage manually every Friday to grab the homework. Meanwhile, I noticed that the webpage is quite simple and easy to be scraped using python. So…why not? Spending a few hours to write a small piece of code to grab the homework automatically sounds great.
